Driver

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • Driver.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main driver class which interacts with the user and drives the program according to users input
    Since:
    2018-09-27
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mandeep Ahlawat

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void assignInitialArmies()
      This method defines Assigning the initial number of armies to each player who gets in the game.
      static void assignInitialTerritories()
      This method Assigns the initial territories randomly to the players in the game.
      static void assignTerritoriesAndArmies()
      This method is a part of startup phase and assign initial territories to players and gives them a set of initial armies and lets them place those armies in the assigned countries
      static void buildMap()
      This method builds the map from the text lines which are read from the file selected to load the map.
      static void createNewMap()
      This method lets user to build a new map and then displays the full map to the user on the screen.
      static void editMap(java.lang.String filePath)
      This method lets user to edit an existing map based on the line number selected and then displays the new map
      static void loadMap()
      This method loads the Map and displays its content.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      This is the main method which runs the program
      static void mapSelection()
      This method asks user about map selections.
      static void populateUserEnteredContinentLines(java.util.List<java.lang.String> allLines)
      This method is used for populating the data of userEnteredContinentLines array list.
      static void populateUserEnteredTerritoryLines(java.util.List<java.lang.String> allLines)
      This method is used for populating the data of userEnteredTerritoryLines array list.
      static void setLineText(int lineNumber, java.lang.String newData, java.lang.String filePath)
      This method replaces the content of a line number in a file with the new content.
      static void startUp()
      Public method startUp will assign territories and armies to the player's in the game if it satisfies the condition only otherwise it will display invalid map and call's this method again.
      static boolean validateMapLine(boolean isContinent, java.lang.String newLine)
      This method is used to validate the new map line entered by the user.

    • Method Detail

      • validateMapLine

        public static boolean validateMapLine(boolean isContinent,
                                      java.lang.String newLine)
        This method is used to validate the new map line entered by the user.
        Parameters:
        isContinent - A boolean value to denote if we are editing a continent, if false then it means we are editing a territory.
        newLine - A String entered by the user to replace the old line in map.
        Returns:
        True if new line is valid otherwise False.

      • createNewMap

        public static void createNewMap()
        This method lets user to build a new map and then displays the full map to the user on the screen.

      • setLineText

        public static void setLineText(int lineNumber,
                               java.lang.String newData,
                               java.lang.String filePath)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This method replaces the content of a line number in a file with the new content.
        Parameters:
        lineNumber - The line number where we want to place the new content.
        newData - The new content which we want to replace the old data.
        filePath - The path of the file to be edited.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in some circumstance.

      • editMap

        public static void editMap(java.lang.String filePath)
        This method lets user to edit an existing map based on the line number selected and then displays the new map
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path of the file to be edited, if the path is null then user will be asked to input the file path.

      • populateUserEnteredContinentLines

        public static void populateUserEnteredContinentLines(java.util.List<java.lang.String> allLines)
        This method is used for populating the data of userEnteredContinentLines array list.
        Parameters:
        allLines - A list of strings which contains all the lines inside map file.

      • populateUserEnteredTerritoryLines

        public static void populateUserEnteredTerritoryLines(java.util.List<java.lang.String> allLines)
        This method is used for populating the data of userEnteredTerritoryLines array list.
        Parameters:
        allLines - A list of strings which contains all the lines inside map file.

      • loadMap

        public static void loadMap()
        This method loads the Map and displays its content.

      • mapSelection

        public static void mapSelection()
        This method asks user about map selections. Depending on the choice entered user can create a new map, edit an existing map or load an existing map.

      • assignInitialTerritories

        public static void assignInitialTerritories()
        This method Assigns the initial territories randomly to the players in the game.

      • assignInitialArmies

        public static void assignInitialArmies()
        This method defines Assigning the initial number of armies to each player who gets in the game.

      • buildMap

        public static void buildMap()
        This method builds the map from the text lines which are read from the file selected to load the map.

      • assignTerritoriesAndArmies

        public static void assignTerritoriesAndArmies()
        This method is a part of startup phase and assign initial territories to players and gives them a set of initial armies and lets them place those armies in the assigned countries

      • startUp

        public static void startUp()
        Public method startUp will assign territories and armies to the player's in the game if it satisfies the condition only otherwise it will display invalid map and call's this method again.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is the main method which runs the program
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments
